About the Client

Canacintra is a corporation with national coverage that worries about goverment and social situations.

The Challenge

Develop official site that engages users to get to know more about the corporation, get in contact in case of any social situation and a platform where they can sign up to events in the region.

Solution

Created a landing page that describes with visuals what the corporation is all about, added information about their main goal, a section for the events, contact, gallery and frequent questions.

Technologies

  • HTML, CSS3
  • Less, SASS
  • Javascript
  • PHP
  • Ajax
  • Marvel App (Mockups)

Torreón, México
